item.description:
@mordkhetzvi Gotta agree with you. Though as a book cover designer, I see what they‚Äôre trying to do, am convinced I could do better, realize it‚Äôs not a simple assignment‚Ä¶

@mordkhetzvi and then get revolted to have that assignment in my head. So I definitely feel for the cover designer.

item.description: What? Disingenuousness in a letter signed by Josh Gottheimer, a congressman who smeared a group of largely Jewish protestors as antisemitic? I‚Äôm shocked! https://t.co/Pnyl3vw0of

item.description: @michaelharriot @nhannahjones @pewresearch As someone who can trace my family roots back past the mid 19th century only because my grandfather did the work 50 years ago, I‚Äôm not surprised that many people can‚Äôt.
